attributes.action: Justice for Special Sergeant Andrew Blades - Convicted of Dangerous Driving
attributes.additional_details: For full details please go to: http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-3441404/Volunteer-PC-treated-criminal-trying-protect-colleague-Special-constable-convicted-dangerous-driving-using-patrol-car-stop-thug-bikers.html
attributes.background: Special Sgt. Andrew Blades blocked a road with his patrol car to try and stop youths who were causing motorcycle nuisance. In their attempt to get around the car they clipped the kerb and collided with the car. Sc Blades was prosecuted and convicted of Dangerous Driving and banned for 12 months.

rejection.details:
Courts are independent of the Government and Parliament.You can find out more about appealing against a sentence here:

https://www.gov.uk/appeal-against-sentence-conviction/magistrates-court-verdict

If you would like Parliament to change the law that applies in similar cases, you could start a petition calling for the specific change you want.
